name: Slow Form Training
description: Step-by-step guidance on practicing slow, deliberate Tai Chi forms to improve flow and mindfulness.

cards.title: Ward Off Movement
cards.description: A fundamental movement that builds stability and control.
bulletpoints: Shift weight smoothly between both legs
Extend one arm while maintaining a rounded posture
cards.summaryText: Glide through ward off with fluid weight shifts, rounded arms, and unbroken flow.

cards.title: Grasp the Bird’s Tail
cards.description: A combination of Tai Chi movements incorporating balance and coordination.
bulletpoints: Move through each transition slowly and with intent
Maintain a relaxed yet controlled posture
Use breath to guide each movement
cards.summaryText: Ease through grasp the bird’s tail, letting breath pace each balanced transition.
